header.name: chaos/preprocessor/logical/bool.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that performs a Boolean conversion on an integer literal.

macro.abstract: The macro performs a Boolean conversion on its argument.

usage.param: The integer literal to be converted. Valid values range from 0 to .

macro.para: If x expands to 0, this macro expands to 0. Otherwise, it expands to 1.
